text: Abo abeegomba e mbeeraye olunaku lwa jjo, baatuuka okugamba nti weewaawo ddala Katonda ayanjuluza riziki kwoyo gwaba ayagadde mu baddube era nga bwasobola okugifunza. Singa Katonda teyatwagaliza kirungi, naffe yaaliragidde ettaka neritumira yye abaffe tokiraba nti abakaafiiri tebayinza kutuuka ku buwanguzi
